glsa.title: radvd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in radvd which could potentially lead to privilege escalation, data loss, or a Denial of Service.

background.p: radvd is an IPv6 router advertisement daemon for Linux and BSD.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in radvd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote unauthenticated attacker may be able to gain escalated privileges, escalate the privileges of the radvd process, overwrite files with specific names, or cause a Denial of Service. Local attackers may be able to overwrite the contents of arbitrary files using symlinks.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All radvd users should upgrade to the latest stable version:
